Default examples.

                                                
                                                    @include('common.ckeditor.ckeditor', [
                                                    'id' => 'ckeditorId',
                                                    'name'=>'ckeditorName',
                                                    'value' => ckeditorValueFromBackend,
                                                    'form' => 'ckeditorFormName',
                                                    'blurCallback' => 'CkEditorBlurFn',
                                                    'focusCallback' => 'EditorFocusFn',
                                                    'push' => true,
                                                    'LabelText' => 'label Name',

                                                ])
